WorkItem.Description:
MEGLIO LASCIARE COSI'
Â 
The start and stop of actions should be managed by two separate methods rather than a parametric one.
Will give a better interface.

Comments.Message: Most of the actions implemented so far require to do a lot of similar things to start and stop. To avoid code duplication the internal implementation should remain as is, but should be called by the start/stop different routines. Lots of trouble for an "estetic" interface change? The current interface already "suggests" to factor things.
